related_materials.name: Gibco™ Fetal Bovine Serum value heat inactivated (formerly USDA-approved in North America or quali

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8j63i","text":"Transform each plasmid into Stbl3 competent cells for the propagation. Next day, pick up one  colony to inoculate   culture in LB medium with ampicillin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c5oib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"36086AE008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"61ug2","text":"Midi prep the cultures to purify plasmids (Qiagen).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87vrm","text":"Plate 5 x 106 HEK 293T cells on a 10 cm plate in DMEM medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jmpj","text":"Add retroviral packaging plasmids (pVSV-G, pBS-CMV-gagpol) and pMRX-IP-HaloTag7-LC3,   each in   warm Opti-MEM medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"355cv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"4AE4D75008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"4FABFC5008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17r8d","text":"At 72 hours post-transfection, collect retroviral supernatant into a falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lphg","text":"Concentrate retroviral supernatant to   using Lenti-X concentrator (Takara) with the manufacturer instruction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"478fs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"6EE7493008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12f1p","text":"Plate 1 x 105 ATG3 KO HeLa cells into 12-well plate one day before.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86vnu","text":"Next day, titrate  ,  ,   of concentrated retroviral solution with   Polybrene (Sigma) into target HeLa cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqhol","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"921972C008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"8BEDDBC008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"89C04D6008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"7C26DB6008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57vcq","text":"At 24 hours post-transduction, remove retroviral supernatant and replace with fresh DMEM  complete medium with   puromycin (GoldBio).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6k7ck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"98D4035008DD11EE9FFE9D3A62DE4093","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36qdm","text":"Perform Puromycin selection for two weeks. Confirm Halo-LC3B positive cells by FACS sorting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
